sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function Popup({ selected, closePopup }) { console.log(selected); const year = selected.end_date; var desc = ''; if(selected.synopsis){ desc = selected.synopsis; } else{ desc = "No Description available"; } return (
  1. {selected.rating}
  2. {selected.type}
    3. {selected.genres.map((genre) => (
  3. {genre.name}
    4. ))}
  4. {selected.year}

{ selected.title }

{desc}

Trailer

) } export default Popup
